title: What is advanced manufacturing technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Generally-making everything by machines. Of different kinds. Each machine has its own characteristics. Example: Instead of cutting metals by handsaw you do it with laser beam. What is laser beam-this is an most accurate method that supports many technologies, as from measuring all the way to surgeries. To learn more - google for “laser beam”. After you understand everything there, I will help you further on. Rima
